h1_title: Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You
content: Most NPCs will remain in the area you find them, meaning you'll need to return to speak to them if they provide a service like selling goods or upgrading your Gourd. Other characters may show up in future chapters, provided you met them in previous chapters.

The content is as follows:
Most NPCs will remain in the area you find them, meaning you'll need to return to speak to them if they provide a service like selling goods or upgrading your Gourd. Other characters may show up in future chapters, provided you met them in previous chapters.
